activities: We provide hosting services as part of software offerings allowing our clients to transmit their data for secure storage and access.  We do not collect or process any data.  We do access client data for the purpose of responding to service requests.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: We have access to client data that may include personally identifiable information of individuals in the EU.  We do not collect or process the data and do not control what data clients choose to have hosted.
